snippet: Los Angeles authorities say a man was fatally stabbed on a platform of the Metro Purple Line subway in the Koreatown neighborhood and that a suspect has been detained....

headline.main: Cuba’s Raul Castro Blasts Trump’s Mexican Wall and Trade Policy
headline.print_headline: Cuba’s Raul Castro Blasts Trump’s Mexican Wall and Trade Policy

lead_paragraph: Los Angeles authorities say a man was fatally stabbed on a platform of the Metro Purple Line subway in the Koreatown neighborhood and that a suspect has been detained.
